reviewText: Happy to have this Robson Green BBC-TV drama. I'm a fan of his work--Reckless, The Student Prince, Me & Mrs. Jones, Joe Maddison's War, Touching Evil, Grantchester, Wire In the Blood . . .
Ordered this because I love Robson Green in just about anything.  This is well acted and has a surprise twist. (And nothing about it made me love Robson Green any less)
Unusual part for robson green, but very well done... Makes you think!!!!!!
Robson Green is a fine actor.  The story was very sad.
I ordered this dvd because i really like Robson Green.  I found it to disturbing in that it dealt with spousal abuse and that the ending is not a good one.  The acting was great
I so enjoy finding anything by Robson, especially if I have never heard or seen it. Quality and mailing time were great.

A marriage on the edge, and a young child caught in the middle. It's the story of Michael and his wife, and about how their past affects their marriage and their lives. The story is well told and the acting is superb - once again Robson Green proves that he is a genious in his field. Dont miss out on this excellent British drama!
